name: pdf-editor
description: Editor to generate PDFs in browsers, plugin-free

scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && ncp ./editor ./dist && browserify ./index.js -o dist/node_modules.js && uglifyjs dist/node_modules.js -o ./dist/node_modules.js && uglifyjs dist/vendor/pdf.js -o ./dist/vendor/pdf.js && uglifyjs dist/vendor/pdf.worker.js -o ./dist/vendor/pdf.worker.js

author: Gregor Martynus <gregor@martynus.net>
